rows.label: qev092605_MSG0001
rows.name: Dadapon![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0002
rows.name:
Tora! Only one year has passed,
but Dadato barely recognize you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0003
rows.name: Dadato right. Tora has grown so big![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0004
rows.name: Heh heh! Tora not just bigger... Look![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0005
rows.name:
That coin is proof of membership in Commerce Guild.
Tora is bona fide merchant now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0006
rows.name: Now Tora is greatest ally—and rival—of legendary Dadato![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0007
rows.name:
Mamara so proud that Tora kept promise.
This is great news. Wonderful news![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0008
rows.name: But Tora not get this far alone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0009
rows.name: Tora only become Guild merchant thanks to help of friends.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0010
rows.name:
Oh, we just dabbled. This is really a product
of your desire to be independent, Tora.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0011
rows.name:
Looking at you reminded me of myself
back when I first left New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0012
rows.name: Don't you think so, Chief?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev092605_SEL0011
rows.name: Confess that you can see the resemblance.

rows.label: qev092605_JNK0020
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev092605_SEL0021
rows.name: Say that Tora's a lot more with-it than Mia was.

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0013
rows.name:
Right? I joined up as a BLADE,
and Tora here joined his guild as a merchant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0014
rows.name:
We'll have to keep supporting each other
from here on out, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0015
rows.name: Any time![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0015_2
rows.name:
Tora will work hardest of all Nopon.
Show Tatsu who best merchant really is![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0016
rows.name:
Yeah, I suppose that's fair.
I really was a little...rash back then.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0017
rows.name:
You've got a good head on your shoulders, Tora.
...Or whatever those are.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0018
rows.name: Friend is again perceptive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0019
rows.name: But Tora must work hard as possible to stay ahead of Tatsu![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0020
rows.name: Tora find good friends.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0021
rows.name:
And good friends far more precious
than coin of Commerce Guild.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0022
rows.name: Tora best take good care of them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0023
rows.name: Most important thing to merchant not money or products...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0024
rows.name: It connections with others![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0025
rows.name:
Dadato and Mamara only able to
sell around world because of friends we have.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0026
rows.name:
And with that, now it time to travel more.
Stay healthy and happy, Tora![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0027
rows.name:
See you on day of promise next year.
Take care, Sonnypon![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0028
rows.name:
Wait, WHAT? But you just met up!
They can't leave already![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0029
rows.name:
Legendary merchants never stay in same place
for more than hour. It bad for business![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0030
rows.name:
They always out chasing next deal
or exploring new corner of Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0031
rows.name: Tora is little sad...but more than that, Tora proud![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0032
rows.name:
Huh. I guess I know that feeling.
We really are alike, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0033
rows.name:
I feel like I've asked this before, Chief,
but if my folks were still alive...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0034
rows.name:
do you think they'd look at me now,
all professional, and be...proud?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_JNK0030
rows.name: Affirm

rows.label: qev092605_SEL0031
rows.name:
Tell Mia you're sure her parents
would be floored with pride.

rows.label: qev092605_JNK0040
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev092605_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Mia that she still has a ways to go.

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0035
rows.name: Heh. Thanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0035_2
rows.name:
I'm sure a lot of that is thanks to you
always sticking by me, Chief.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0036
rows.name:
I appreciate all the help.
I look forward to learning more by your side![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0037
rows.name:
Yeah? Well, then I hope you'll stick around
to help me get there, Chief.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0038
rows.name:
I feel like as long as I'm with you,
I'll keep heading in the right direction.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0039
rows.name:
Looking at them, I think that's probably
how my folks were, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0040
rows.name:
Each one serving as the other's compass.
The perfect partners for adventure...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0041
rows.name: Man...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092605_MSG0042
rows.name: Now I really miss my dads.[ST:wait ]
